result.markdown:
--- title: "Sheffield Lord Mayor's 10K" date: "2010-04-18" author: "Adrian Joseph" image: https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport_small/2010-04-18_SHEFFIELD_LORD_MAYOR_S_10K/img/01.png categories: [race report, run] format: html lightbox: match: auto effect: fade desc-position: right loop: false --- ![](https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport_small/2010-04-18_SHEFFIELD_LORD_MAYOR_S_10K/img/01.png) This was my first competitive 10K. It was ran in and around the now demolished old athletic stadium in the outskirt of Sheffield (UK), the town I was living at the time. I do not remember much from this race, just the my housemate Olesya and trained together for a few months for this, and we went there by tram. I think we run it together, and I run at a pretty conservative pace. ## Summary ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {layout-ncol=4} ![](https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport_small/2010-04-18_SHEFFIELD_LORD_MAYOR_S_10K/img/01.png){ width="100" group="hi" } ![](https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport_small/2010-04-18_SHEFFIELD_LORD_MAYOR_S_10K/img/02.jpg){ width="100" group="hi" } ![](https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport_small/2010-04-18_SHEFFIELD_LORD_MAYOR_S_10K/img/03.jpg){ width="100" group="hi" } :::
